title: Could not parse comandline. Please check for invalid parameters. WHAT?
body: I have no idea what that means and I can't get league running. My Mac has been having a lot of problems with League the past few months, and the only way I have been able to play is by going to my friends house, (And he lives 2 hours away.) It has said, "Could not parse comandline. Please check for invalid parameters." I've looked inside of the launcher and have not been able to find anything wrong. Help?

replies.body:
I'm curious if your PC is meeting [minimum specs](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752654-Minimum-and-Recommended-System-Requirements).  Check it out, because your rig might not meet recommendations that may be the cause of this error.

We'd like to take a closer look and see what's going on.  Hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so we can help individually.  Grab our [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) as well to attach some logs to the ticket for context.  We'll reply back asap.

I downloaded and ran the Hexech Repair tool, but I could not figure out what to do with it after. The Support ticket is saying that I'm not signed in, but when I try to sign in, it forwards me to a lost password and username site. It would be best if I could obtain the information I need on this discussion. 
(Sorry I have had so many problems. I have not played for weeks, and my mom put restrictions on the computer, so that might have done something.)

I downloaded and ran the Hexech Repair tool, but I could not figure out what to do with it after. The Support ticket is saying that I'm not signed in, but when I try to sign in, it forwards me to a lost password and username site. It would be best if I could obtain the information I need on this discussion.
